selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the expected output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the selected multiple-choice option label as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: read_angle_from_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the measure of a specified angle from a geometric diagram.
edge_cases: The angle label is not visible or obscured in the diagram.
Multiple angles are labeled with the same identifier.

new_skill_specs.name: map_angle_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the measured angle to the correct multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: The angle measure does not match any of the provided options.
Multiple options have the same angle measure.
